attributes.action: demand, as the representattive of the majority shareholder in RBS, that they withdraw their offer to fund Kraft buying Cadbury with what is OUR MONEY.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the Prime Minister to demand, as the representattive of the majority shareholder in RBS, that they withdraw their offer to fund Kraft buying Cadbury with what is OUR MONEY. 

It might actually show that there is a point in actually having a Goverment. It would generally be nice if they could cease from being content to abdicate the responsibility of Government to the market and do something useful for a change.

No-one wants this to happen. The only ones who want this to happen are Kraft, and it can happen, because we are stupid enough to let it happen. We all know what will come next, we've seen it with everything else that has been sold off. When are you going to get it, or is it that you just don't care???

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
